description: Taco night just became a whole lot more tantalising thanks to this easy taco recipe. This meal is perfect for nights when you're after something meat-free.
name: Easy Bean & Veg Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths Prep Set Go frozen Mediterranean roasting mix
840g four bean mix no added salt, rinsed, drained
0.5 bunch coriander, leaves picked, roughly chopped
2 little green gem lettuce, leaves separated

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook roasting mix for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until veggies start to soften. Add beans, garlic and spice mix, then cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until veggies start to lightly char. Remove pan from heat. Add coriander and toss to combine.

Meanwhile, heat a large chargrill pan over high heat. Cook tortillas, in batches, for 30 seconds on each side or until lightly charred and warmed through. Wrap in foil to keep warm. Serve with veg mixture, lettuce and yoghurt.
